required.name: FIREBASE_API_KEY
required.description: Firebase API key for authentication and other Firebase services

required.name: STRIPE_API_KEY
required.description: Stripe API key for payment processing

required.name: STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET
required.description: Stripe webhook secret for verifying webhook events

required.name: GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
required.description: Google Maps API key for location services

required.name: OPENWEATHER_API_KEY
required.description: OpenWeather API key for weather data

optional.name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID
optional.description: Google Analytics ID for tracking user behavior

optional.name: ALGOLIA_APP_ID
optional.description: Algolia App ID for search functionality

optional.name: ALGOLIA_API_KEY
optional.description: Algolia API key for search functionality
